author: rhuijben
msg: Update svn_wc__check_wc_root to return separate 'is root of working copy'
and 'is switched' values. Update implementation to use wc_db instead of
entries. Update callers to keep their current and/or documented behavior.
Update caller, keeping current behavior which is most likely broken.
(log_do_committed): Update caller. Also handle the corrupt working
copy state that can occur and that was previously ignored inside
(svn_wc__check_wc_root): Reimplement over wc_db. Return errors when the path
is not found/versioned, instead of just returning false
(svn_wc_is_wc_root2): Update caller. Calculate expected result based on the
combined values. Return SVN_ERR_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND on path not found errors,

author: stylesen
msg: (deliver): If ServerSignature is disabled in apache, do not print

author: danielsh
